channel.title: Comments on: Sugar Science Website Launched

item.title: By: Michele Mizejewski
item.dc:creator: Michele Mizejewski
item.description: So no Cokes at the new coffee bar then?
item.content:encoded: So no Cokes at the new coffee bar then?

item.title: By: Julia Kochi
item.dc:creator: Julia Kochi
item.description: Such an interesting project. I saw the website mentioned by sites diverse as nytimes.com (http://well.blogs.nytimes.com/2014/11/12/website-explores-sugars-effects-on-health/), Harper's Bazaar (http://www.harpersbazaar.com/beauty/health-wellness-articles/health-effects-of-sugar), and Tech Times (http://www.techtimes.com/articles/19948/20141111/uc-san-francisco-launches-sugar-science-website-about-whats-not-sweet-about-sugar.htm)
item.content:encoded: Such an interesting project. I saw the website mentioned by sites diverse as nytimes.com (http://well.blogs.nytimes.com/2014/11/12/website-explores-sugars-effects-on-health/), Harper’s Bazaar (http://www.harpersbazaar.com/beauty/health-wellness-articles/health-effects-of-sugar), and Tech Times (http://www.techtimes.com/articles/19948/20141111/uc-san-francisco-launches-sugar-science-website-about-whats-not-sweet-about-sugar.htm)
